message.content:
cs.RO, cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.RO (Robotics) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a robotic face for communication with humans.
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is also likely as the paper compares the use of the robotic face to a screen-based avatar for communication.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is relevant as the robotic face uses a fish-eye lens and facial animation system to present expressions and eye movement.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is relevant as the robotic face is designed to closely model natural face-to-face communication.
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of a projector and visual speech for the robotic face.
